description.zh-cn: 1964年为庆祝中华人民共和国成立十五周年而创作演出的大型音乐舞蹈史诗，纪录和歌颂了中国人民在中国共产党和毛泽东领导下的革命斗争历史。
description.en: A large-scale musical and dance epic created and performed in 1964 to celebrate the 15th anniversary of the founding of the People's Republic of China, documenting and eulogizing the history of the Chinese people's revolutionary struggle under the leadership of the Communist Party of China and Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 中国无产阶级革命家、政治家、军事家、外交家，中国共产党和中华人民共和国第一代主要领导人之一，曾担任大型音乐舞蹈史诗《东方红》的总导演。
description.en: A Chinese proletarian revolutionary, statesman, military leader, and diplomat, one of the main leaders of the first generation of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as the general director of the large-scale musical and dance epic 'The East Is Red'.

description.zh-cn: 中国无产阶级革命家、战略家、理论家、书法家、诗人，中国共产党、中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。其领导的革命斗争是《东方红》的主题，并对剧目内容提出过修改意见。
description.en: A Chinese proletarian revolutionary, strategist, theorist, calligrapher, and poet, the main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Liberation Army, and the People's Republic of China. The revolutionary struggle he led is the theme of 'The East Is Red', and he also suggested revisions to the show's content.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。其领导的革命斗争是大型音乐舞蹈史诗《东方红》的主题。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China. The revolutionary struggle under its leadership is the theme of the large-scale musical and dance epic 'The East Is Red'.

description.zh-cn: 由中国人民解放军空军政治部文工团创作的大型歌舞表演，被认为是《东方红》的雏形之一。
description.en: A large-scale song and dance performance created by the Cultural Troupe of the Political Department of the People's Liberation Army Air Force, considered one of the prototypes for 'The East Is Red'.

nodes.id: 在毛泽东旗帜下高歌猛进

zh-cn: 在毛泽东旗帜下高歌猛进

description.zh-cn: 由上海文艺界为庆祝上海解放十五周年而创作的大歌舞，被视为《东方红》的底本。
description.en: A grand song and dance performance created by the Shanghai literary and art circles to celebrate the 15th anniversary of the liberation of Shanghai, considered the basis for 'The East Is Red'.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜人民军演出的大型歌舞，其形式启发了《革命历史歌曲表演唱》的创作。
description.en: A large-scale song and dance performance by the Korean People's Army, the format of which inspired the creation of 'Revolutionary History Song Performance'.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军首任司令员。他在出访朝鲜后，受《三千里江山》启发，指示空政文工团创作了《革命历史歌曲表演唱》。
description.en: The first Commander of the People's Liberation Army Air Force. After a visit to North Korea, he was inspired by 'Three Thousand Li of Rivers and Mountains' and instructed the Air Force Political Department's Cultural Troupe to create 'Revolutionary History Song Performance'.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军空军政治部文工团

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军政治部文工团

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军的文艺团体，创作了《革命历史歌曲表演唱》。
description.en: The cultural troupe of the People's Liberation Army Air Force, which created 'Revolutionary History Song Performance'.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共中央总书记和中华人民共和国主席。1964年，他以清华大学学生的身份参加了《东方红》的排练，并在《人民日报》发表观后感。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and President of the People's Republic of China. In 1964, as a student at Tsinghua University, he participated in the rehearsals for 'The East Is Red' and published his thoughts on it in the People's Daily.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的著名高等学府。胡锦涛曾在此就读，并以该校学生身份参加《东方红》排练。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher learning located in Beijing, China. Hu Jintao studied here and participated in the rehearsals for 'The East Is Red' as a student of the university.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的机关报。曾刊登过胡锦涛关于《东方红》的观后感。
description.en: The official newspaper of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China. It published Hu Jintao's review of 'The East Is Red'.

description.zh-cn: 1965年由北京电影制片厂、八一电影制片厂和中央新闻纪录电影制片厂联合摄制的彩色宽银幕舞台艺术片，改编自同名音乐舞蹈史诗。
description.en: A 1965 color widescreen stage art film jointly produced by Beijing Film Studio, August First Film Studio, and Central Newsreels and Documentary Film Studio, adapted from the musical and dance epic of the same name.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代一场以青年学生为主的爱国运动。《东方红》史诗内容的时间起点。
description.en: A patriotic movement in modern China led mainly by young students. It marks the starting point of the historical narrative in the epic 'The East Is Red'.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的建筑，是全国人民代表大会开会和举行重大政治、外交、文化活动的场所。《东方红》于1964年10月2日在此首演。
description.en: A building in Beijing, China, serving as the venue for the National People's Congress and major political, diplomatic, and cultural events. 'The East Is Red' premiered here on October 2, 1964.

description.zh-cn: 中国女高音歌唱家，在音乐舞蹈史诗《东方红》中担任《农友歌》的领唱。
description.en: A Chinese soprano who performed as the lead singer for the song 'Song of the Peasant Friends' in the musical and dance epic 'The East Is Red'.

description.zh-cn: 中国女高音歌唱家，在音乐舞蹈史诗《东方红》中独唱《南泥湾》。
description.en: A Chinese soprano who performed the solo 'Nanniwan' in the musical and dance epic 'The East Is Red'.

description.zh-cn: 中国无产阶级革命家、军事家、外交家，中华人民共和国十大元帅之一。他观看了《在毛泽东旗帜下高歌猛进》后，指示邀请周恩来观看，从而推动了《东方红》的创作。
description.en: A Chinese proletarian revolutionary, military strategist, and diplomat, one of the Ten Marshals of the People's Republic of China. After watching 'Singing Loudly under the Banner of Mao Zedong', he instructed that Zhou Enlai be invited to see it, which promoted the creation of 'The East Is Red'.

description.zh-cn: 周恩来担任大型音乐舞蹈史诗《东方红》的总导演，并提议将其创作为国庆十五周年献礼节目。
description.en: Zhou Enlai served as the general director of the large-scale musical and dance epic 'The East Is Red' and proposed its creation as a tribute for the 15th anniversary of the National Day.

description.zh-cn: 《东方红》旨在歌颂中国人民在中国共产党领导下进行的革命斗争。
description.en: 'The East Is Red' aims to eulogize the revolutionary struggle of the Chinese people under the leadership of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 《东方红》旨在歌颂中国人民在毛泽东领导下进行的革命斗争，展现毛泽东思想。
description.en: 'The East Is Red' aims to eulogize the revolutionary struggle of the Chinese people under the leadership of Mao Zedong and to showcase Mao Zedong Thought.

description.zh-cn: 根据毛泽东的意见，《东方红》的最后两场“祖国在前进”和“世界在前进”在后续演出及电影版中被删除。
description.en: Based on Mao Zedong's suggestion, the last two scenes of 'The East Is Red', 'The Motherland is Advancing' and 'The World is Advancing', were removed in subsequent performances and the film version.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜人民军的大型歌舞《三千里江山》启发了刘亚楼，促使其指示空政文工团创作了《革命历史歌曲表演唱》。
description.en: The large-scale song and dance performance 'Three Thousand Li of Rivers and Mountains' by the Korean People's Army inspired Liu Yalou, leading him to instruct the Air Force Political Department's Cultural Troupe to create 'Revolutionary History Song Performance'.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军司令员刘亚楼在观看朝鲜歌舞《三千里江山》后，指示空政文工团创作了《革命历史歌曲表演唱》。
description.en: After watching the North Korean song and dance performance 'Three Thousand Li of Rivers and Mountains', Liu Yalou, Commander of the PLA Air Force, instructed the Air Force Political Department's Cultural Troupe to create 'Revolutionary History Song Performance'.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军空军政治部文工团

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军政治部文工团具体负责创作并演出了《革命历史歌曲表演唱》。
description.en: The Cultural Troupe of the Political Department of the People's Liberation Army Air Force was responsible for creating and performing 'Revolutionary History Song Performance'.

description.zh-cn: 《革命历史歌曲表演唱》被认为是大型音乐舞蹈史诗《东方红》的雏形。
description.en: 'Revolutionary History Song Performance' is considered a prototype for the large-scale musical and dance epic 'The East Is Red'.

relationships.source: 在毛泽东旗帜下高歌猛进

description.zh-cn: 周恩来在观看上海的《在毛泽东旗帜下高歌猛进》后，决定以此为基础改编，在北京排演为国庆献礼的《东方红》。
description.en: After watching 'Singing Loudly under the Banner of Mao Zedong' in Shanghai, Zhou Enlai decided to adapt it as the basis for 'The East Is Red' to be rehearsed in Beijing as a tribute for the National Day.

relationships.target: 在毛泽东旗帜下高歌猛进

description.zh-cn: 陈毅观看《在毛泽东旗帜下高歌猛进》后，指示中共上海市委邀请周恩来观看，此举直接促成了《东方红》的诞生。
description.en: After watching 'Singing Loudly under the Banner of Mao Zedong', Chen Yi instructed the Shanghai Municipal Party Committee to invite Zhou Enlai to see it, a move that directly led to the creation of 'The East Is Red'.

description.zh-cn: 在1964年《东方红》公演成功后，周恩来提议将其拍摄成电影。
description.en: After the successful performance of 'The East Is Red' in 1964, Zhou Enlai proposed that it be made into a film.

description.zh-cn: 1965年的电影版《东方红》改编自同名的音乐舞蹈史诗舞台剧。
description.en: The 1965 film version of 'The East Is Red' was adapted from the stage musical and dance epic of the same name.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛曾就读于清华大学，并在1964年以该校学生身份参加《东方红》排练。
description.en: Hu Jintao studied at Tsinghua University and, as a student, participated in the rehearsals for 'The East Is Red' in 1964.

description.zh-cn: 1964年，胡锦涛以清华大学学生身份参加了《东方红》的排练，并于同年10月在《人民日报》发表观后感。
description.en: In 1964, Hu Jintao participated in the rehearsals for 'The East Is Red' as a student at Tsinghua University and published his thoughts on it in the People's Daily in October of the same year.

description.zh-cn: 《人民日报》于1964年10月6日刊登了时为清华大学学生的胡锦涛撰写的《东方红》观后感。
description.en: On October 6, 1964, People's Daily published a review of 'The East Is Red' written by Hu Jintao, who was then a student at Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 《东方红》的内容涵盖了从五四运动到中华人民共和国成立期间的中国革命斗争历史。
description.en: The content of 'The East Is Red' covers the history of the Chinese revolutionary struggle from the May Fourth Movement to the founding of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 大型音乐舞蹈史诗《东方红》于1964年10月2日在北京人民大会堂首次公演。
description.en: The large-scale musical and dance epic 'The East Is Red' premiered at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing on October 2, 1964.

description.zh-cn: 王昆在《东方红》中担任歌曲《农友歌》的领唱。
description.en: Wang Kun served as the lead singer for the song 'Song of the Peasant Friends' in 'The East Is Red'.

description.zh-cn: 郭兰英在《东方红》中担任歌曲《南泥湾》的独唱。
description.en: Guo Lanying performed the solo for the song 'Nanniwan' in 'The East Is Red'.
